primary.reasoning: The button 'Sign up' has a dark background color (#2A222B) which is not vibrant or saturated. However, it is the only button present, making it the primary CTA by default. There are no other buttons to compare for a secondary action.

secondary.reasoning: There is no secondary button available as there is only one button present on the page.

personality.targetAudience: business professionals and organizations looking for survey solutions.

survey_basics.title: Typeform
survey_basics.purpose: Create interactive forms, surveys, and quizzes
survey_basics.description: Typeform is a platform for creating interactive forms, surveys, and quizzes that engage users and collect valuable data.
survey_basics.estimated_completion_time: Varies based on the form length
